channel.title: Making a PlayerHandler.messageTo(PLAYERNAME)
channel.description: I would like to make a command that sends a message to only 1 person, but I do not know how to do that. So... Can anyone tell me how I make something like this that only sends a message to 1 person if somebody does something please?

item.description:

i think it would be something like this

else if command starts with "send" && players name
then the normal command code under it,
and you do ::send playersname message[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 01:38:56 PM[/size][hr]something like that.
